# Usage

```{r module_usage}
library("raster")
library("reproducible")
library("SpaDES.core")
library("SpaDES.tools")

scratchDir <- file.path("/mnt/scratch")

options(reproducible.cacheSaveFormat = "rds")

setPaths(modulePath = file.path(dirname(getwd())),
         outputPath = checkPath(file.path(scratchDir, "TMP_priorityPlacesTest"), create = TRUE))
getPaths() # shows where the 4 relevant paths are
options(reproducible.showSimilar = TRUE)
times <- list(start = 2001, end = 2100)

parameters <- list(
  priorityPlaces_DataPrep = list(
    "stepInterval" = 99,
    "typeOfAnalysis" = "biodiversity",
    "weights" = data.frame(stream = c('stream3', 'stream4', 'stream5'),
                           weight = c(1.5, 1, 0.5)) ## streams 3, 4, 5
  ),
  priorityPlaces = list(".useCache" = TRUE,
                        "solver" = "rsymphony", ## change accordingly
                        "fasterOptimization" = TRUE,
                        "targets" = c(0.3, 0.2), ## streams 1, 2
                        "binaryDecision" = FALSE,
                        "firstFeasible" = FALSE,
                        "presolve" = 2,
                        "verbose" = TRUE,
                        "timeLimit" = 1800)
)

modules <- list("priorityPlaces_DataPrep", "priorityPlaces")
inputs <- list()
outputs <- list()

objects <- list()

mySim <- simInitAndSpades(times = times, params = parameters, modules = modules, objects = objects)
```
